title: Which K-pop company is easy to get into? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wouldn’t say there is any company that is easier to enter than another. Each has its pros and cons and each has what they hold of uttermost value and what is more or less useless to them. So at the end of the day its balanced. So choosing a company depends on you, your talents, abilities and capabilities. Thanks

Seventeen! I get that they are so many but when I watched some of their videos on Youtube and I saw comments there having a guide in a funny way HAHAHAHA by the way that’s their Haloween special, and they also welcomed me as a baby carat 🥺 when I told them I’m slowly being a carat. 🥰🥰
